original_text: Also he gave him the copy of the writing of the decree that was given at Shushan to destroy them, to shew it unto Esther, and to declare it unto her, and to charge her that she should go in unto the king, to make supplication unto him, and to make request before him for her people.
korean_text: 또 유다인을 진멸하라고 수산 궁에서 내린 조서 초본을 하닥에게 주어 에스더에게 보여 알게 하고 또 그에게 부탁하여 왕에게 나아가서 그 앞에서 자기 민족을 위하여 간절히 구하라 하니

sentences.original_text: Also he gave him the copy of the writing
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그는 그에게 그 글의 사본을 주었는데

sentences.original_text: of the decree that was given at Shushan
and to declare it unto her
and to charge her that she should go in unto the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀에게 왕에게 들어가라고 명령하기 위함이었으며

sentences.original_text: and to make request before him for her people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 백성을 위해 그 앞에서 간구하기 위함이었다
